newsitem.title: CHINA: Wing Sung to issue bonues shares.
newsitem.headline: Wing Sung to issue bonues shares.

text.p: Shanghai Wing Sung Co said on Tuesday it would offer 1.5-for-10 bonus shares for all shareholders based on the firm's 1996 net profit.
Details of the bonus issue including an ex-rights date will be announced later, the company said in a statement published in the Shanghai Securities News.

Wing Sung, a stationery maker, registered net profits of 2.29 million yuan in 1996 under international accounting standards, up from 1.19 million in 1995, the company said earlier in its 1996 annual report.
